welcome_message_body: Welcome to Longmont, where the stunning Rocky Mountains meet charming small-town vibes. Get ready to explore our historic downtown, artisanal breweries, and breathtaking outdoor scenery. We hope you have a fantastic time discovering all that Longmont has to offer!

restaurants.name: Lucile's Creole Cafe
restaurants.description: Lucile's Creole Cafe is a cajun and creole restaurant located in Longmont.

restaurants.name: The Roost
restaurants.description: The Roost is a american restaurant located in Longmont.

restaurants.name: Flavor of India
restaurants.description: Flavor of India is a indian restaurant located in Longmont.

restaurants.name: Mike O'Shays Restaurant & Ale House
restaurants.description: Mike O'Shays Restaurant & Ale House is a american restaurant located in Longmont.

restaurants.name: Rosalee's Pizzeria
restaurants.description: Rosalee's Pizzeria is a pizzeria located in Longmont.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boulder Municipal Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Boulder Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Erie Municipal Airport serves all commercial flights and provides amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Erie Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights, offering exclusive services and facilities.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network after signing in with their email address.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Weld County Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Weld County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipalcipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipalcipal Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free.
